{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA9200 |revision=(4A) |asin=B00ON7AX3U |fcc_date=10/03/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117B |manuf_rev=AC33 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA9200 |ic_id=3839A-EA9200 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG, TT1417 P10, 372828-08 Z1D; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=looks like it |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1415 P11, 374072-04 3A W; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1415 P11, 374072-04 3A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1415 P11, 374072-04 3A W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;PLX, Technology (R), PEX8603-AB50NI G, 1402, 1475B, TAIWAN;1; |flags=256QAM |stock_boot=CFE; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• 2x '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''3200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC3200 Tri-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9200/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA9200|pid=01t80000003efNkAAI}} "P/N: 141911720033J R01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: ''[[Arcadyan]]'' WG9117BAC33 {{WiFiCert|WFA56630|10/15/2014}} ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0 @1GHz DualCore SoC (ARM Cortex A9) *WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 - 3T3R 2.4/5GHz 802.11abgn/ac (256-QAM) :integrated CPU @320MHz (ARM Cortex R4) w/ embedded 960KB SRAM :[https://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom BCM43602'' Press release] :[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s915966 ''Broadcom Tri-Band'' Press release] *This is a tri-radio device - it's using three BCM43602s (like other [[Broadcom]] :''XStream'' gear, such as the [[Netgear R8000]] and [[ASUS RT-AC3200]]). ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32553-linksys-ea9200-ac3200-tri-band-smart-wi-fi-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0 :*RAM: 256 MB, Flash: 128 MB :*2.4 GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 ::- 2.4 GHz Power Amps (x3) :*5 GHz radio: 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 ::- 5 GHz Power Amps (x3) :*PCIe: ''PLX Technology'' PEX8603 - 3-lane, 3-port PCIe switch :*Switch: in [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0 - GbE (1x WAN, 4x LAN) ===See also=== *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[ASUS RT-AC3200]] *[[Netgear R8000]] *[[TP-LINK Archer C3200]] *[[TRENDnet TEW-828DRU V1.0R|TRENDnet TEW-828DRU]] __NOTOC__
